greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array T read by diagonals; T(i,j) = i^2 + j^2.
comment: For any i,j >=0 a(i)*a(j) is a member of this sequence, since (a^2 + b^2)*(c^2 + d^2) = (a*c + b*d)^2 + (a*d - b*c)^2. - _Boris Putievskiy_, May 05 2013
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
